channel.title: Banned from my Nintendo wii AGAIN!
channel.description:
Hey guys....
Was playing a bit of mario kart wii and I got permanently banned...
I managed to get myself back into the game though, but I don't really know if the unban code works for the other games...
How long do you think Nintendo could keep me banned enough? They have to give you a chance, like if you start hacking and all...u might be banned.
****This is nothing out of the ordinary, I'm just asking a very simple question here****

item.title: Banned from my Nintendo wii AGAIN!
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

[quote author=m1lkman link=topic=539482.msg3948688#msg3948688 date=1332102907]

[quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=539482.msg3948668#msg3948668 date=1332102391]
What the fuck would you have to do to get banned on a wii game

Download hacking software onto your wii.

Correction: Downloading the software…well, nintendo really doesnt give a crap about the hacking software called “The hombrew channel”

Its basically what u use it for…good or evil!!!

U can listen to music, customize ur wii themes…

Also u can use it to mess up the codes of a game for ur advantage, 99.99% online…nintendo’ security is in fact shit compared to xbox and ps3… of all my 1000 battles on mariokartwii, i only saw a nintendo admin playing there once lol…
But i didnt make it obvious to get myself banned…

Conclusion: the wii is shit for pro gamers. Thats why I need to grow up and play battlefield 3, black ops, or mw3 for xbox360 lol

Read full topic

[quote=“m1lkman, post:19, topic:436765”][quote author=angelofdeath396 link=topic=539482.msg3948553#msg3948553 date=1332096662]
The wii is not all-that popular anymore…

I mean…I’m gathering money for an xbox 360 atm $270/$400 for a 250 gig with kinect…

The wii is good for young kids, but not really for some high packed…super shooter games…

Maybe Ill sell mine for $200, including a f
[/quote]

Won’t be able to sell for 200, I’d say 50 at the most.[/quote]I remember when the damn thing came out, people were killing each other for it

item.title: Banned from my Nintendo wii AGAIN!
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:16, topic:436765”][quote author=Travas link=topic=539482.msg3948445#msg3948445 date=1332093203]

[quote author=m1lkman link=topic=539482.msg3948438#msg3948438 date=1332093107]

True what you guys say…im just gonna quit hacking…though i still plan on keeping homebrew channel because I need it sometimes…

Move on to a ps3 or a xbox360. the wii is dead and gone

Lol no it isn’t. It’s just for the younger ones.

I have a wii but no ps3orxbox360 So I just don’t play anygames
I don’t like playing those games anyways
[/quote]The only game I ever played on my wii was wii sports, and I didn’t even buy it, it came with it.

They all do…
[/quote]and who said it didnt

Why did you say “I didn’t even buy it, it came with it”. It’s common knowledge that all the Wii’s come with a copy.[/quote]thanks for proving my point, it came with it. Which means I’ve never bought a game for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from my Nintendo wii AGAIN!
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

Well, you can get banned for hacking and changing the codes of a videogame, thats what I did…

Usually it says error code 20102/20103, meaning that you got banned…

All i wanna know is if its worth it to call nintendo and to ask them for a chance?

I really want to get a few games that have wifi connected battles, but idk if the unban code works especially with those games.

Read full topic
